mapper.select: select board_id, title, content, b_writer, writer_email, b_date, thumbs_up from board where board_id = #{board_id}
select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, thumbs_up from board where b_writer = #{b_writer}
select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, thumbs_up from board where board.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, b_writer, writer_email, b_date) value (#{title}, #{content}, #{b_writer}, #{writer_email}, #{b_date})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, b_date = #{b_date} where board_id = #{board_id}
update board set thumbs_up = #{thumbs_up} where board_id = #{board_id}
